amendment.description: To improve the provisions relating to the Inspector General of the National Intelligence Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3882 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3882 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S10234-10236; text: CR S10234) To improve the provisions relating to the Inspector General of the National Intelligence Authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3882 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3882 proposed by Senator Stevens.
